import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";import boxShadows from"assets/theme/base/boxShadows";// Material Kit 2 React Helper Function
import rgba from"assets/theme/functions/rgba";const{black,white}=colors;const{borderWidth,borderRadius}=borders;const{md}=boxShadows;export default{styleOverrides:{root:{display:"flex",flexDirection:"column",position:"relative",minWidth:0,wordWrap:"break-word",backgroundColor:white.main,backgroundClip:"border-box",border:"".concat(borderWidth[0]," solid ").concat(rgba(black.main,0.125)),borderRadius:borderRadius.xl,boxShadow:md,overflow:"visible"}}};
